analysis.headline: Your AI Chat Privacy
analysis.quote: Provides private access to AI chatbots Optional feature built into default search engine that lets you have private conversations with popular 3rd-party AI chat models.

analysis.headline: Your Data Selling Clarity
analysis.quote: Global Privacy Control Expresses opt-out rights on your behalf by telling sites not to sell or share your personal info.

analysis.headline: Your Default Protections Limited
analysis.quote: App Tracking Protection Blocks app trackers on Android devices... Opt-in required.

analysis.headline: Your Broad Location Usage
analysis.quote: Shows local search results, like restaurants nearby, without accessing your exact location.

analysis.headline: Your YouTube Direct Usage
analysis.quote: Plays YouTube videos without targeted ads Protects you from targeted ads and cookies and incorporates YouTube’s strictest privacy settings for embedded video.

analysis.headline: Your Ad Blocking "Attempts"
analysis.quote: Blocks non-tracking ads Attempts to block all online advertising, including non-intrusive ads.

analysis.headline: Your Cloaking Protection "Helps"
analysis.quote: Protects against DNS CNAME cloaking Helps block 3rd-party trackers that try to disguise themselves within a website using DNS.

analysis.headline: Your Identity Service Data
analysis.quote: Helps restore your identity If your identity is stolen, a dedicated advisor will help restore your accounts, recover financial losses, and fix credit report mistakes.

analysis.headline: Your VPN Logging Policy
analysis.quote: Protects your connection with a VPN Encrypts your Internet connection across browsers and apps on your entire device and hides your location and IP address.

analysis.headline: Your Sync Mechanism Opacity
analysis.quote: Privately syncs bookmarks and passwords Lets you sync bookmarks and passwords across your devices with end-to-end encryption—no account needed.
